title: Episode 94 w/ Adrien Broner
itunes:title: Episode 94 w/ Adrien Broner
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys talk to world champion boxer Adrien Broner. They discuss hip hop, Mayweather vs Mcgregor, Cincinnati, and a lot more. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
